Scripts.OnClick:
local activeState = self:GetActiveState()
local numberOfActiveMethods = 0
for k, v in pairs(MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel]) do if(v.active) then numberOfActiveMethods = numberOfActiveMethods + 1 end end
if(button == "LeftButton") then if(activeState == 0 and 2 > numberOfActiveMethods) then --TO 1
MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel][self.category].active = true MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel][self.category].currentLayer = numberOfActiveMethods + 1
self.FontString:SetText(numberOfActiveMethods + 1)
elseif(activeState == 1) then --TO 2
elseif(activeState == 2) then --RESET TO 0
MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel][self.category].active = false MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel][self.category].currentLayer = 0
self.FontString:SetText("")
for k, v in pairs(MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel]) do if(v.currentLayer == 2) then v.currentLayer = 1
local buttonParent = type(self:GetParent()) ~= "Button" and self:GetParent() or type(self:GetParent():GetParent()) ~= "Button" and self:GetParent():GetParent()
buttonArray[k].FontString:SetText(1) MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel][k].currentLayer = 1 end end end
if(2 > numberOfActiveMethods or numberOfActiveMethods == 2 and activeState ~= 0) then self:AdvanceState()
MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel][self.category].currentState = self:GetActiveState()
if(GameTooltip:GetOwner() == self) then GameTooltip:SetText("Current sort: "..self:GetStateName(self:GetActiveState())) end end
elseif(button == "RightButton") then if(activeState == 1 or activeState == 2) then MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel][self.category].active = false MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel][self.category].currentLayer = 0
self.FontString:SetText("")
for k, v in pairs(MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel]) do if(v.currentLayer == 2) then v.currentLayer = 1
local buttonArray = self:GetParent().sortByCategoryButtons or self:GetParent():GetParent().sortByCategoryButtons
buttonArray[k].FontString:SetText(1) MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel][k].currentLayer = 1 end end
self:SetState(false)
if(2 > numberOfActiveMethods or numberOfActiveMethods == 2 and activeState ~= 0) then
MIOG_NewSettings.sortMethods[self.panel][self.category].currentState = self:GetActiveState()
if(GameTooltip:GetOwner() == self) then GameTooltip:SetText("Current sort: "..self:GetStateName(self:GetActiveState())) end end end end
